categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: Clawsito was a male Wookiee major aligned with the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. In 19 BBY, on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk, Clawsito and several Wookiee warriors, accompanied by the Republic's Clone Force 99, were traversing Kashyyyk's forests when they were ambushed by a number of kinrath, poisonous and web–spinning creatures. Despite the unexpected encounter, the Wookiees and clones managed to eliminate the creatures.

Clawsito had gray eyes and a black coat of hair, the latter of which was braided four times at his beard. The Wookiee had claw–like weapons attached to his forearms, and whilst encountering the kinrath he wore armor, a belt, and wielded a bowcaster.

Named by Star Wars creator George Lucas, Clawsito was developed for an unfinished arc of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars animated series, set on Kashyyyk. Written by Matt Michnovetz, the arc would have been four episodes long and had the production codes 6.17–6.20. A clip from the arc's unfinished story reels was shown at Celebration Anaheim in 2015, featuring Clawsito, who was identified by series supervising director Dave Filoni following the clip's conclusion.
